thread.title: John Pick

author: John Pick
title: John Pick
text:
On Saturday afternoon I found I had a flat tyre due to a nail.
I went onto this website, found my tyres and put the order in.
An email was sent immediately confirming that I would have my tyre changed on Sunday morning.
I received a call 25 minutes before the technician arrived. The service was quick, friendly and efficient. I would thoroughly recommend the service and hats off to the company for employing such excellent technicians
